entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
